post.text:
Language Chauvinism (extreme disrespect towards other state languages) is a Colonial divide that was first introduced into India by British in Tamil Nadu…

This mindset has now crept into Karnataka and Maharashtra… 

As a Telugu native person, I am proud that we never hate any OTHER state’s language… that’s because we are busy hating our OWN language Telugu… hence Andhra-Telangana split happed… 

The linguistic landscape of India is one hell of a squid game where all of us are set to lose fighting each other…
